Effect of Processing a Notice of Death
The Hines ITC maintains a running balance of amounts on deposit in PFOP accounts.
If a notice of death transaction is processed at the Hines ITC on an account subject to a withholding for PFOP, the ITC notifies the field station of the amount on deposit in PFOP to the Veteranâ€™s account and requests its disposition.
